name: BrainStorm (itch) (Theleafcuter, SlooperNine, The_Spaceboi, rhino_min, Ritchi, Kayla Roeten)
name_original: BrainStorm (itch) (Theleafcuter, SlooperNine, The_Spaceboi, rhino_min, Ritchi, Kayla Roeten)
description:
Strange weather patterns have appeared that make organs rain from the sky. Luckily for you, however, you're a zombie, and a hungry one too!

Collect brains that fall from the top of the screen before they land on the ground, and avoid the anvils descending with them in this 16-bit, arcade game.

Credits:

Programming:

  • Andrich Laker
  • Robin Bono
  • Sjoerd de Koning

Graphics:

  • Moa Hansen
  • Victor Min
  • Kayla Roeten

Music and Sound Effects:

  • Kayla Roeten

Controls:

  • A D or < > to move
  • Mouse to navigate menus
  • ESC for pause

This game was created in 3 days for the International Educations Game Jam.
